3 ^ Deus: 4 ^ Deus exáŭdi oratiónem meam~; áŭribus pèrcipe vèrba oris mei. ^ O God
in nómine tuo salvum me fac: hear my prayer~; give ear to the words of my mouth.

et in virtúte tua júdica me. ^ Save me: et non proposuérunt Deum ante conspectum suum. ^ For strangers have risen up against me
O God: and the mighty have sought after my soul
by thy name: and they have not set God before their eyes.

in nómine tuo salvum me fac: et Dòminus suscèptor est ánimaĕ meaĕ. ^ For behold God is my helper
et in virtúte tua júdica me. ^ Save me: and the Lord is the protector of my soul.

in nómine tuo salvum me fac: et in veritáte tua dispèrde illos. ^ Turn back the evils upon my enemies
et in virtúte tua júdica me. ^ Save me: and cut them off in thy truth.
qŭóniam bonum est~; ^ I will freely sacrifice to thee

3 ^ Deus: 9 ^ qŭóniam ex òmni tribulatióne eripuìsti me
in nómine tuo salvum me fac: et super inimícos meos despèxit òculus meus. ^ for thou hast delivered me out of all trouble
et in virtúte tua júdica me. ^ Save me: and my eye hath looked down upon my enemies.
